import { useContext } from "react"; import { useMatch } from "react-router-dom" import { AppContext } from "../../App"; import NotFound from "../NotFound/NotFound"; import { AddToCart } from "../../Components/AddToCart/AddToCart"; import './Product.css' i export default function Product() { const { params } = useMatch("/products/:slug"); const { products } = useContext(AppContext); const product = products.find(product => product.slug === params.slug); if (!product) { return } return (
